text: Jundiping Subdistrict () is a subdistrict and the seat of Wulingyuan District in Zhangjiajie Prefecture-level City, Hunan, China. The subdistrict was reformed through the amalgamation of Suoxiyu Township (), Tianzishan Town () and the former Jundiping Subdistrict on November 27, 2015. It has an area of with a population of 29,100 (as of 2015). Its seat is Huajuanlu Community ().《湖南省民政厅关于同意张家界市武陵源区乡镇区划调整方案的批复》（湘民行发〔2015〕104号-2015年11月27日）. see rednet.cn (December 4, 2015) ==References== Category:Zhangjiajie Category:Township-level divisions of Hunan
title: Jundiping
